title: 2 "Vengeful Demon of the Abandoned School - Part II"(Japanese:「廃校の復讐鬼」〜第三段〜) October 8, 1999(1999-10-08)
transformers_text: 2 Vengeful Demon of the Abandoned School Part II Japanese October 8 1999 1999 10 08 In the abandoned school the students behave irrationally out of fear as one student after another is killed including it appears the policeman
